content:
Kaspi Bank - Q1 2024 Financial Statement

BALANCE SHEET HIGHLIGHTS:
- Total Assets: 8200.00 billion KZT (growth: 0.0% YTD)
- Loans Portfolio: 5035.53 billion KZT (61.4% of total assets)
- Customer Deposits: 6326.84 billion KZT (77.2% of total assets)

INCOME STATEMENT:
- Net Profit: 217.82 billion KZT
- Return on Equity (ROE): 22.14%
- Return on Assets (ROA): 2.66%
- Net Interest Margin: 5.75%

CAPITAL & RISK METRICS:
- Capital Adequacy Ratio: 16.61% (Basel III requirement: 12.5%)
- Tier 1 Capital Ratio: 13.08%
- Non-Performing Loans (NPL) Ratio: 3.28%
- Loan Loss Coverage: 93.0%
- Cost-to-Income Ratio: 38.6%

LIQUIDITY:
- Liquidity Coverage Ratio (LCR): 167.8%
- Net Stable Funding Ratio (NSFR): 112.2%
- Loan-to-Deposit Ratio: 79.6%

The bank maintains strong capital buffers and healthy liquidity positions, demonstrating robust financial health in Q1 2024.

Kaspi Bank - Q1 2024 Operational Metrics

NETWORK INFRASTRUCTURE:
- Total Branches: 85 locations nationwide
- ATM Network: 340 machines
- Self-Service Terminals: 577
- Employee Count: 1,785 professionals

CLIENT BASE:
- Total Active Clients: 825,178 customers
- Digital Banking Users: 701,401 (85.0% digitalization rate)
- New Clients This Quarter: 19,295
- Corporate Clients: 41,258
- Retail Clients: 783,919

DIGITAL BANKING PERFORMANCE:
- Mobile App Downloads: 697379
- Active Mobile Users: 515,428
- Online Transactions Volume: 8.9 million transactions
- Digital Transaction Share: 75.1% of all transactions
- Average Mobile App Rating: 4.7/5.0

PRODUCT PENETRATION:
- Cards Issued: 1,463,224 total cards
- Credit Cards: 402,644
- Debit Cards: 969,796
- Active Loan Accounts: 159,810
- Deposit Accounts: 607,019

EFFICIENCY METRICS:
- Transactions per Employee: 320 per day
- Average Service Time: 4.6 minutes
- Customer Satisfaction Score (NPS): 56
- Employee Productivity Index: 86.0%

Kaspi Bank continues to expand its digital capabilities while maintaining a strong physical presence across Kazakhstan.

Kaspi Bank - Q1 2024 Market Analysis & Strategic Overview

MARKET POSITION:
- Market Share by Assets: 12.47%
- Market Share by Loans: 11.98%
- Market Share by Deposits: 12.00%
- Ranking in Kazakhstan: #2

YEAR-OVER-YEAR COMPARISON:
- Asset Growth YoY: 12.5%
- Loan Portfolio Growth YoY: 12.7%
- Deposit Growth YoY: 13.9%
- Net Profit Growth YoY: 11.0%
- Client Base Growth YoY: 14.2%

COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGES:
- Leading digital banking platform with 90%+ digitalization
- Strong capital position exceeding regulatory requirements
- Diversified loan portfolio across retail and corporate segments
- Advanced risk management systems
- High customer satisfaction and retention rates
- Innovative fintech ecosystem integration

BUSINESS SEGMENTS PERFORMANCE:
Retail Banking:
- Segment Profit: 113.74 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 2572.12 billion KZT
- Customer Deposits: 4100.07 billion KZT

Corporate Banking:
- Segment Profit: 71.10 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 1938.47 billion KZT
- Customer Deposits: 1773.11 billion KZT

SME Banking:
- Segment Profit: 31.19 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 374.90 billion KZT
- Active SME Clients: 78,132

STRATEGIC INITIATIVES Q1 2024:
- Expansion of digital ecosystem and super-app functionality
- Enhanced cybersecurity and fraud prevention systems
- AI-powered customer service and personalization
- Sustainable finance and ESG integration
- Partnership expansion with fintech companies

RISK MANAGEMENT OVERVIEW:
- Credit Risk: Well-diversified portfolio with prudent underwriting
- Market Risk: Limited exposure, effective hedging strategies
- Operational Risk: Robust controls and business continuity plans
- Compliance: Full adherence to Basel III and local regulations

OUTLOOK:
Kaspi Bank is well-positioned for continued growth in the Kazakhstani banking market, supported by strong fundamentals, 
digital innovation, and commitment to customer value creation.
